snippet: The gold medal winners Abby Wambach, Christie Rampone and Alex Morgan hope for the opportunity to play professionally in the United States again.
lead_paragraph: The gold medal winners Abby Wambach, Christie Rampone and Alex Morgan hope for the opportunity to play professionally in the United States again.

headline.seo: U.S. Women’s Soccer Stars Want Another Pro League
headline.main: U.S. Women’s Stars Hope, Cautiously, That a New Pro League Will Form
